sentences.en: Egypt is a pretty heifer, But a horsefly is coming from the north it is coming!
sentences.cn: 耶46:20埃及是肥美的母牛犊.出于北方的毁灭〔灭或作牛虻)到了、到了.

sentences.en: That horsefly is the only thing keeping this old horse moving.
sentences.cn: 那只马蝇是唯一能让这匹老马活动的东西。

trans.tran_en: a large fly that bites horses and cattle
